comments:
I changed several colors in the Syntax Highlighting options for both Text 
editors, and for Java edtiors.  Pressing the [Apply] button worked OK. 
However, when I pressed [OK] to close the Preferences window, I got the 
following two errors, and then was unable to close the preferences window.  
Required killing the java VM to close Eclipse.

To reproduce:

1) Window -> Preferences -> Java -> Editor -> Syntax Coloring
2) Under Java -> Keyword 'return', change color to something
3) Click OK

Dialog pops up "An error has occurred. See error log for details"

Error log fills up with "Argument not valid" entries:
